member.summary:
Initialize the podio class with Client ID and Client Secret
You can get the Client ID and Client Secret from here: https://developers.podio.com/api-key
member.param: Client ID
Client Secret

If you need to persist the access tokens for a longer period (in your session, database or whereever), Implement PodioAPI.Utils.IAuthStore Interface and pass it in.
You can use the IsAuthenticated method to check if there is a stored access token already present
